BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-ArtiaX
BundleInfo.Author: Utz Ermel, Serena M. Arghittu, and Achilleas Frangakis
BundleInfo.Description: ArtiaX is an open-source extension for visualization and processing of cryo electron tomography data. It allows rendering of macromolecular complexes within their context in electron tomograms, picking particles for subtomogram averaging, and assessing results of image classification or template matching procedures.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Tool :: ArtiaX :: General :: Opens Tomo Plugin GUI
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax start :: General :: Start and Initialize ArtiaX plugin.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax view :: General :: Set standard viewing directions.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax open tomo :: General :: Open a Tomogram in ArtiaX.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax add tomo :: General :: Add a volume loaded by ChimeraX to ArtiaX.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax attach :: General :: Attach a model to an ArtiaX particle list.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax show :: General :: Render particles of the specified lists with this style.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax hide :: General :: Hide particles of the specified lists with this style.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax lock :: General :: Prevent types of movement for these particle lists.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax unlock :: General :: Allow types of movement for these particle lists.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax particles :: General :: Set particle list properties.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax tomo :: General :: Set tomogram properties.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax fit sphere :: General :: Fits a sphere to the currently selected particles.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax fit line :: General :: Fits a line to two selected particles.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax fit surface :: General :: Fits a plane through the selected particles.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax boundary :: General :: Creates a hull around the selected particles.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax mask :: General :: Creates a mask from the selected geometric model.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax fit curved line :: General :: Fits a smooth line between the selected particles.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax triangulate :: General :: Triangulates all selected particles.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax remove links :: General :: Removes links from selected particles.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax triangles from links :: General :: Creates a triangle surface between all particles marked by links.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax flip :: General :: Rotates the selected particles 180 degrees around the given axis. Default degree is 180.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax select inside surface :: General :: Selects all shown particles inside the selected surface.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax geomodel color :: General :: Set geomodel color.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax moveCameraAlongLine :: General :: Moves camera along a specified line.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax filter tomo :: General :: Filter a tomogram using low, high, or band-pass filters.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax gen in surface :: General :: Generates points inside a specified surface.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax gen on surface :: General :: Generates points on a specified surface.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax geo2vol :: General :: Add geomodels to volumes.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax vol2geo :: General :: Create geomodels from volumes.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax mask triangle radius :: General :: Mouse mode for masking connected triangles.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax remove overlap :: General :: Moves particles with attached surfaces so that no surfaces overlap.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax info :: General :: Print information about tomograms or particle lists.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax colormap :: General :: Color particles by attribute.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax label :: General :: Label particles with attribute.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax clip :: General :: Turn on slab-dependent clipping planes for a tomogram.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax cap :: General :: Turn on/off surface capping for particle lists.
ChimeraX :: Command :: artiax invert :: General :: Invert the contrast of specified or all visible tomograms.
